name: ListBookingProfiles
description:
Retrieve booking profiles for team members.

Use this tool to obtain a list of booking profiles associated with team members. Ideal for viewing or managing team schedules and bookings.

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to return in a paged response.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return in a paged response.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: The cursor for pagination to retrieve the next page of results. Omit for the first page of results.

value_schema.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

parameters.name: filter_by_location_id
parameters.description: Filter to return only team members enabled at the specified location ID.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether to include only team members enabled at the given location in the returned result.

parameters.name: include_only_bookable_members
parameters.description: Set to true to include only team members who are bookable. False includes all members.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether to include only bookable team members in the returned result (`true`) or not (`false`).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: bookable_only
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include only bookable team members in the returned result (`true`) or not (`false`).

value_schema.description: Indicates whether to include only bookable team members in the returned result (`true`) or not (`false`).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in a paged response.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return in a paged response.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

value_schema.description: The pagination cursor from the preceding response to return the next page of the results. Do not set this when retrieving the first page of the results.

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Indicates whether to include only team members enabled at the given location in the returned result.

value_schema.description: Indicates whether to include only team members enabled at the given location in the returned result.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
